Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits non-physicians from having control of professional corporations organized to practice medicine
Summary: Prohibits non-physician organizations or their representatives to hold majority shares in or serve as directors of professional corporations organized to practice medicine.
LawCode: Add §§1406-a & 1406-b, N-PC L; add §§1517 & 1518, amd §1508, BC L; amd §§2801 & 2801-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, the business corporation law and the public health law, in relation to prohibiting non-physician management services organizations or their representatives to hold majority shares in or serve as directors of professional corporations organized to practice medicine
